properties.name: spring.devtools.add-properties
properties.description: Whether to enable development property defaults.

properties.name: spring.devtools.livereload.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable a livereload.com-compatible server.

properties.name: spring.devtools.livereload.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable a livereload.com-compatible server.

properties.name: spring.devtools.livereload.port
properties.description: Server port.

properties.name: spring.devtools.livereload.port
properties.description: Server port.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.context-path
properties.description: Context path used to handle the remote connection.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.proxy.host
properties.description: The host of the proxy to use to connect to the remote application.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.proxy.host
properties.description: The host of the proxy to use to connect to the remote application.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.proxy.port
properties.description: The port of the proxy to use to connect to the remote application.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.proxy.port
properties.description: The port of the proxy to use to connect to the remote application.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.restart.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable remote restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.restart.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable remote restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.secret
properties.description: A shared secret required to establish a connection (required to enable remote support).

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.secret-header-name
properties.description: HTTP header used to transfer the shared secret.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.additional-exclude
properties.description: Additional patterns that should be excluded from triggering a full restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.additional-exclude
properties.description: Additional patterns that should be excluded from triggering a full restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.additional-paths
properties.description: Additional paths to watch for changes.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.additional-paths
properties.description: Additional paths to watch for changes.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable automatic restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable automatic restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.exclude
properties.description: Patterns that should be excluded from triggering a full restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.exclude
properties.description: Patterns that should be excluded from triggering a full restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.log-condition-evaluation-delta
properties.description: Whether to log the condition evaluation delta upon restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.log-condition-evaluation-delta
properties.description: Whether to log the condition evaluation delta upon restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.poll-interval
properties.description: Amount of time to wait between polling for classpath changes.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.poll-interval
properties.description: Amount of time to wait between polling for classpath changes.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.quiet-period
properties.description: Amount of quiet time required without any classpath changes before a restart is triggered.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.quiet-period
properties.description: Amount of quiet time required without any classpath changes before a restart is triggered.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.trigger-file
properties.description: Name of a specific file that, when changed, triggers the restart check. Must be a simple name (without any path) of a file that appears on your classpath. If not specified, any classpath file change triggers the restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.restart.trigger-file
properties.description: Name of a specific file that, when changed, triggers the restart check. Must be a simple name (without any path) of a file that appears on your classpath. If not specified, any classpath file change triggers the restart.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.debug.enabled
properties.description: Enable remote debug support.

deprecation.reason: Remote debug is no longer supported.

properties.name: spring.devtools.remote.debug.local-port
properties.description: Local remote debug server port.

deprecation.reason: Remote debug is no longer supported.
